Sun Dont Shine, the twisted brainchild from the dark underbelly of heavy metal, has unleashed their savage anthem "In The End" to shred your pathetic soul into oblivion! This ainâ€™t your mamaâ€™s lullaby â€” it's a statewide riot, fueled by the raw, unfiltered energies of Crowbar and Type O Negative! ðŸ¤˜
And hereâ€™s the kicker, my homies: this chaos won't stop! Brace yourselves for their debut armageddon of an album titled *Birth To Death*, expected to slam its way into existence in early 2026! This album promises nothing less than the sonic equivalent of a nuclear meltdown â€” a relentless assault of riffage and doom thatâ€™ll leave you gasping for air while headbanging like thereâ€™s no tomorrow!
So crank that volume to eleven, grab your crypto wallets, and prepare for the reckoning! Weâ€™re diving into the abyss where metal meets the digital frontier! This is just the beginning! \m/ \m/
Check the madness out here: [SUN DONT SHINE (CROWBAR, TYPE O NEGATIVE) Streams "In The End", Announces Debut Album For 2026](https://metalinjection.net/video/sun-dont-shine-crowbar-type-o-negative-streams-in-the-end-announces-debut-album-for-2026). And remember, the metal never dies, and neither does crypto! HELL YEAH!!! ðŸ¤˜ðŸ”¥
